faq.question: Character Stuck
faq.answer: Normal playing is impossible because the character is trapped in a specific area and cannot move, or the character is moved to the same coordinate repeatedly (rubber-banding). Try returning to the obelisk using the Return skill, or press the space bar to jump. If jumping or using the Return skill does not solve the problem, then enter the chat command “/EmergencyReturn” or use the emergency return function to get out.

faq.question: Character Unable to Login
faq.answer: All or some of the characters on the account cannot login to the game. If none of the characters on the account can login to the game, please refer to the guide displayed on the bottom of the login screen, or use the forums on our website. If some of the characters in the account cannot login to the game, login with another character and use the Submit Petition with the name(s) of character(s) that require assistance.

faq.question: Moving to Another Area from a City
faq.answer: To move to other areas from [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA07] or [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA08], use the teleporter found at the entrance to the city.
